Home.title: Hi, I'm
Home.aboutMeContent: From a young age, I discovered my passion for problem-solving and found software development to be the perfect tool. At 14, I began programming, turning a hobby into a career. After high school, I studied Computer Engineering and trained in various programming languages. Currently, I work at a consulting firm, enjoying the chance to learn and grow professionally. My goal is to keep developing in the software field, contributing innovative and efficient solutions to emerging challenges.
